title: Takeaways from Doris Kearns Goodwin
description:
John Maxwell and Mark Cole were recently in Boston to learn from Doris Kearns Goodwin, author of the acclaimed book on Abraham Lincoln, A Team of Rivals. In this episode John and Mark share their biggest takeaways from their time with Goodwin and her insightful wisdom on presidential history and leadership in the United States.

Our BONUS resource for this episode is the Takeaways from Doris Kearns Goodwin Worksheet, which includes fill-in-the-blank notes from John’s teaching. You can download the worksheet by visiting MaxwellPodcast.com/Goodwin and clicking “Download the Bonus Resource.”

References:

A Team of Rivals by Doris Kearns Goodwin

Change Your World by John C. Maxwell

ChangeYourWorld.com

The John Maxwell Online Store
